      • setWeaponType

        void setWeaponType(int type)
        Sets the weapon type
        Parameters:
        type - - 0 is off, 1 is Ki Blade, 2 is Ki Scythe

      • getWeaponType

        int getWeaponType()
        Returns:
        - 0 is off, 1 is Ki Blade, 2 is Ki Scythe

      • setColor

        void setColor(int color,
              float alpha)
        Sets the weapon color.
        Parameters:
        color - If it's set to -1, it relies on current aura color.
        alpha - opacity of the color. 0 - Transparent, 1 - Opaque
